ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: I consider how things might be in the future, and try to influence those things with my day to day behavior
Notes: 1=Extremely uncharacteristic; 2=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 4=Somewhat characteristic; 5=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: Often I engage in a particular behaviour in order to achieve outcomes that may not result for many years
Notes: 1=Extremely uncharacteristic; 2=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 4=Somewhat characteristic; 5=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: I only act to satisfy immediate concerns, figuring the future will take care of itself (item is reverse scored, indicate the SCORE here)
Notes: 5=Extremely uncharacteristic; 4=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 2=Somewhat characteristic; 1=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: I only act to satisfy immediate concerns, figuring the future will take care of itself (item is reverse scored, indicate the RESPONSE here)
Notes: 1=Extremely uncharacteristic; 2=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 4=Somewhat characteristic; 5=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: My behaviour is only influenced by the immediate (i.e., a matter of days or weeks) outcomes of my actions (item is reverse scored, indicate the SCORE here)
Notes: 5=Extremely uncharacteristic; 4=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 2=Somewhat characteristic; 1=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: My behaviour is only influenced by the immediate (i.e., a matter of days or weeks) outcomes of my actions (item is reverse scored, indicate the RESPONSE here)
Notes: 1=Extremely uncharacteristic; 2=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 4=Somewhat characteristic; 5=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: My convenience is a big factor in the decisions I make or the actions I take (item is reverse scored, indicate the SCORE here)
Notes: 5=Extremely uncharacteristic; 4=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 2=Somewhat characteristic; 1=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: I am willing to sacrifice my immediate happiness or well-being in order to achieve future outcomes
Notes: 1=Extremely uncharacteristic; 2=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 4=Somewhat characteristic; 5=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: I think it is important to take warnings about negative outcomes seriously even if the negative outcome will not occur for many years
Notes: 1=Extremely uncharacteristic; 2=Somewhat uncharacteristic; 3=Uncertain; 4=Somewhat characteristic; 5=Extremely characteristic;-5 = Item seen but not answered; -999= Data not submitted (incomplete); -9=Hidden by show-if logic

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: I think it is more important to perform a behaviour with important distant consequences than a behaviour with less-important immediate consequences

ElementDescription: Please indicate whether or not the statement is characteristic of you: I generally ignore warnings about possible future problems because I think the problems will be resolved before they reach crisis level (item is reverse scored, indicate the SCORE here)

ElementDescription: Consideration of Future Consequences Scale total score
Notes: Sum of scores from items 1-12

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime
